news_title: Shiba Inu Marketing Lead Explains SOU Compensation Framework Post-Shibarium Hack
news_subtitle: Lucie announces SHIB Owes You (SOU) recovery system following Shibarium exploit. The dual-layer framework uses Ethereum NFTs and BSC fundraising to compensate affected users as burn activity increases.

news_title: Belgium’s KBC Bank to Offer Bitcoin Trading to Retail Customers
news_subtitle: KBC will launch Bitcoin and Ethereum trading on Bolero in February 2026, as CoinCodex projects 2027 downside.
